mapper.select: select rating,nick_name,title,contents,review_date,r.review_id,count(user_id) as count,goods_name,r.goods_id from review as r left join review_like as l on r.review_id=l.review_id left join tb_newbee_mall_order_item as o on o.order_id=r.order_id where r.goods_id= #{goodsId} AND proved=0 group by l.review_id order by rating desc,count desc limit 3
select count(review_id) as totalNum,round(avg(rating),1) as average from review where goods_id= #{goodsId}
select count(contents) as contentsNum from review where goods_id= #{goodsId}
select rating,count(rating) as numOfRating from review where goods_id= #{goodsId} group by rating order by rating desc
